titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Maple Ridge Culture Club Records 1905-1915
titlestmt.subtitle: Maple Ridge Culture Club Records Mss. Acc. 2009.590

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Ute Schechter, 2009

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Maple Ridge Culture Club Records, 1905-1915 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2009.590
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Included are 2 minute books for the Maple Ridge Culture Club of Medina, N.Y. for the years 1905-1907 and 1909-1911, as well as Annual Calendars showing the club's events from 1907-1915. Minute books include bylaws and member roster.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Maple Ridge Culture Club Records, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 12/14/2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in December 2009 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Maple Ridge Culture Club of Medina, N. Y. was founded in 1892.Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki:http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Maple_Ridge_Culture_Club

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Included are 2 minute books for the Maple Ridge Culture Club of Medina, N.Y. for the years 1905-1907 and 1909-1911, as well as Annual Calendars showing the club's events from 1907-1915. Minute books include bylaws and member roster.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
